summary:
Montenegro is a small country in Europe, located on the Balkan Peninsula. It has a population of about 633,000 people and is surrounded by countries like Bosnia, Serbia, and Albania, with a beautiful coastline on the Adriatic Sea. The capital is Podgorica.

Historically, it was home to Illyrians before the Slavs arrived. Over time, it became part of different kingdoms and was ruled by various empires. Montenegro gained independence in the late 19th century and later joined Yugoslavia. After Yugoslavia's breakup, it formed a union with Serbia before becoming an independent nation in 2006. Today, it's working to join the European Union.
title: Montenegro
